results.content: Instructor goes WAYYYY too fast. He doesn't explain anything, he just runs through the content and expects the students to know how everything works. There's some incredibly confusing stuff going on here, and the goal of watching this is to understand how it works. The instructor does not help me understand how it works, he just blasts code out at an extremely high speed and expects us to follow along. It's pretty obvious that he speeds up the content to make it look like he's typing faster or something. WHY??? I need to pause the video every 30 freakin seconds just to type out the stuff in my own IDE. What is the point of going so insanely fast?? Who is this for?
